title: ShadowNet Event
description: Base schema for a single ShadowNet log event.

timestamp.description: When the event occurred (UTC, ISO-8601 format)

event_type.description: Type of event (e.g., auth.login, iam.change, access.s3)

user_id.description: ID of the user or service principal performing the action

dept.description: Department of the user (e.g., Engineering, HR)

src_ip.description: Source IP address of the event

resource.description: Primary resource being accessed or modified
